title: Somebody Ain't You
lyrics:
You say you miss me 'cause he ain't like me
And I try to play it cool, ask what you been up to
But I know what you been up to, I been up to the same thing
Been trying to forget you, you been trying to forget me
Why can't I fall in love with her like I fell for you

Why do I feel like I'm lying every time I tell the truth

Why do we restart every time we are trying to move on, girl it's so hard

When you call me, your friends saw me with somebody but that somebody ain't you



That somebody, somebody ain't you

That somebody, somebody ain't you



You're the one that she knows about

While I give her the go around

I guess that's just how it goes now

'Cause you're the one that we fight about



Why can't I fall in love with her like I fell for you

Why do I feel like I'm lying every time I tell the truth

Why do we restart every time we are trying to move on, girl it's so hard

When you call me, your friends saw me with somebody but that somebody ain't you



Why can't I fall in love with her like I fell for you

Why do I feel like I'm lying every time I tell the truth

Why do we restart every time we are trying to move on, girl it's so hard

When you call me, your friends saw me with somebody but that somebody ain't you

Somebody ain't you

Somebody ain't you
